item.title: Version 1.4.1
item.description: Fixing bug in build start notification with master.

item.title: Version 1.4
item.description:
Now allows monitoring multiple masters.

The current configuration is a bit of a hack, but you can monitor multiple masters by comma-separating the locations in the preferences. Perhaps a later version will have a better UI for this.

item.title: Version 1.3.1
item.description:
Added a menu item to turn off the caps lock.

If growl alerts are disabled or otherwise ignored, it's possible to have the caps lock stuck on. A new menu item turns off the light independent of any build.

item.title: Version 1.3
item.description:
Lots of new features by popular request:

  • Colorize the categories.
  • Give an ETA at the category level.
  • Load the initial build states on connect.
  • Double-click on a build to get more details.

item.title: Version 1.2.1
item.description: Fixed the date format for ETA.

item.title: Version 1.2
item.description: BuildWatch now supports builder categories and displays its contents in a tree view.

item.title: Version 1.0.8
item.description: Minor fix -- show offline builders in red.

item.title: Version 1.0.7
item.description:
I can tell the difference between a build failure and warning now and offer different growl notifications (and listing display) for each.

I'd been reading the wrong config entry for caps lock support, so the preference was just ignored. Now I'll happily hijack your keyboard's caps lock as a build status indicator.

item.title: Version 1.0.6
item.description:
Fixed a long-standing and annoying problem where you had to restart the app whenever you changed configuration. Restructured some of the internals to make this possible by doing more things the Right Way.

This hopefully gets me in a much better position to running against multiple buildbots at the same time.

item.title: Version 1.0.5
item.description: This release adds connectivity robustness by periodically testing the connection. I've been stuck in a place where connectivity is spotty and would find that BuildWatch was no longer watching my builds, but pretending like it was.

item.title: Version 1.0.4
item.description:
Finally fixed an annoying misbehavior that's been bothering me as long as I've been running this thing — having to sort the stupid list every time I start the app. Now it can remember and do it for me.

  • Remember the sort order across restarts
  • Optionally use the caps lock light to point out build failures

item.title: Version 1.0.3
item.description:
Some more cleanup.

  • Reconnect handling
  • Internal restructuring
  • bug fixes

item.title: Version 1.0.1
item.description: Did a little bit of cleanup around the preferences. It actually closes the window for you now and lets you know that I suck and can't have the changes immediately take effect.

item.title: Version 1.0
item.description: The initial version works well enough for me, but can go a little further.
